statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, quantity, date_added FROM inventory_management;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM inventory_management WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE supplier_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM inventory_management WHERE date_added >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < reorder_level
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryLevels ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_level FROM InventoryLevels WHERE supplier_id = 2
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < reorder_level ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels JOIN Suppliers ON InventoryLevels.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY product_id ASC, supplier_name DESC;

SELECT product_name, current_stock, supplier_name FROM InventoryLevels INNER JOIN Suppliers ON InventoryLevels.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id WHERE current_stock < reorder_level AND supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryLevels WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company') ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, count(product_id) AS total_products FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN InventoryLevels ON Suppliers.supplier_id = InventoryLevels.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_products > 3 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, delivery_date FROM supply_chain WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, product_id, current_quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE current_quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain ORDER BY delivery_date DESC, supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, delivery_date FROM supply_chain WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01' AND delivery_date <= '2022-02-28' ORDER BY delivery_date;
SELECT product_id, current_quantity, reorder_level FROM inventory_management WHERE location_id = 1 AND current_quantity < reorder_level;
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, delivery_date FROM supply_chain JOIN inventory_levels ON supply_chain.product_id = inventory_levels.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, supplier_id, quantity, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT sale_id, product_id, customer_name, quantity, sale_date FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 100
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.id = sales.product_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sales.sale_id, inventory.product_name, purchases.quantity FROM sales JOIN inventory ON sales.product_id = inventory.id JOIN purchases ON sales.product_id = purchases.product_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, address, contact_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, p.product_name, w.location, t.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON t.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, manager FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions INNER JOIN products ON transactions.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
